description:
Enjoy this game with friends! Invite them to a game and prove who will be the king of The Viking's Games: Madness Fight.

- Up to 4 different Vikings to choose from.
- Climatic changes in the scenario to change the type of fight.
- Crazy controls and different from any other game you've seen.
name: The Viking's Games: Madness Fight
intro: The Viking's Games: Madness Fight is a fighting game for 2 players, where you move your arms madly to try to hit your opponent and win the fight.
